CVE.summary: Multiple SQL injection vulnerabilities in index.php in PHPAccounts 0.5 allow remote attackers to execute arbitrary SQL commands via the (1) Outgoing_Type_ID, (2) Outgoing_ID, (3) Project_ID, (4) Client_ID, (5) Invoice_ID, or (6) Vendor_ID parameter.

Suricata.signature: ET WEB_SPECIFIC_APPS PHPAccounts SQL Injection Attempt -- index.php Outgoing_Type_ID SELECT
